archdesc.runner: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle:
Genealogical Charts of the Brockenbrough-Fauntleroy, Gray, Montgomery, and Newton-Keene Families
1968-1981
did.physdesc: This collection consists of 4 items. They are electrostatic and mechanically reproduced copies of the privately held original documents.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: James Mason Grove, Genealogical charts of the Brockenbrough-Fauntleroy, Gray, Montgomery and Newton-Keene families, 1968-1981, Accession # 10532, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was given to the library on January 7, 1983 by Mason Grove of Williamsburg, Virginia.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of genealogical charts tracing the Brockenbrough-Fauntleroy, Gray, Montgomery, and Newton-Keene families of Virginia.

did.unittitle: "Pedigree of Montgomery of Westmoreland County, Virginia" 1976
"Some of the Ancestors and Descendants of Dr. Thomas Branch Willson Gray of Culpeper and Essex..." 1981
